TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider extends System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider
Public NotInheritable Class RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider Inherits ProtectedConfigurationProvider

summary.span: 提供使用 RSA 加密对配置数据进行加密和解密的 实例。

span.span: Provides a instance that uses RSA encryption to encrypt and decrypt configuration data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了加密存储在配置文件，它有助于保护其免遭未经授权的访问的敏感信息的方法。The class gives you a way to encrypt sensitive information stored in a configuration file, which helps protect it from unauthorized access. 使用内置通过声明提供程序并在配置文件中而不是创建此类的实例进行适当的设置，如本主题后面的示例中所示的实例。You use the built-in instance by declaring the provider and making appropriate settings in the configuration file instead of creating an instance of this class, as shown in the example later in this topic. 对象使用由提供的加密函数类进行加密和解密配置节。The object uses the cryptography functions provided by class to encrypt and decrypt configuration sections. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 可以解密你的配置文件中的加密的信息之前，ASP.NET 应用程序的标识必须具有对用于加密和解密配置数据的加密密钥的读取访问。Before ASP.NET can decrypt encrypted information in your configuration file, the identity of your ASP.NET application must have read access to the encryption key used to encrypt and decrypt the configuration data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 加密配置信息使用受保护的配置](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e1652f90-eac5-4f51-bff1-cf1acc2e1180)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e1652f90-eac5-4f51-bff1-cf1acc2e1180). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用标准保护或取消保护配置节。The following code example shows how to use the standard to protect or unprotect a configuration section. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider/CS/RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider/VB/RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示加密后的配置文件的摘录。The following example shows an excerpt from a configuration file after encryption. ``` Rsa Key B702tRDVHJjC3CYXt7I0ucCDjdht/Vyk/DdUhwQyt7vepSD85dwCP8ox9Y1BUdjajFeTFfFBsGypbli5HPGRYamQdrVkPo07bBBXNT5H02qxREguGUU4iDtV1Xp8BLVZjQMV4ZgP6Wbctw2xRvPC7GvKHLI4fUN/Je5LmutsijA=  ```

permission.span: 用于对权限所保护的资源的完全访问。

span.span: for full access to the resource protected by the permission.

public: RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider();

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用的。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
